text: Todor Slavov (; 22 January 1984 â€“ 28 June 2015) was a Bulgarian rally driver. On 28 June 2015, Slavov was involved in a crash at Rally Tvarditsa-Elena. Soon after, he died of fatal injuries. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bulgarian sportspeople Category:Deaths in sport Category:Road accident deaths
